maleRestroom.text: So the guy of the note... it was you, Guille.

femaleRestroom.text: What are you doing in the girls' restroom, Guille?
You can't be here. Go away.

explainRestroom.text: I needed to talk with you. I'm the one who left the note.

ask.text: So now you talk to me.
What about half of the class ignoring me?

explanation.text: That's what I wanted to talk about.
I can't talk to you as long as Alex or any of his friends can see us.
He's threatened to send my parents a picture of me smoking and drinking.
My parents are very strict and if they find out I don't know what could happen... They might even send me to another high school.

explanationQuestion.text: But why doesn't Alex want anybody to talk to me?

continueExplanation.text: We don't know. He has it in for you since the first day.
Too many people do what he wants by themselves, but there are a few of us who have been threatened by him.
It happened something similar last year to Maria, although that was Anna's doing.
She doesn't have friends since then, and whenever any of us tries to talk to her... she ignores us.
Well... I just wanted to say sorry, but until Alex stops being upset I won't be able to talk to you.

choices.text: And that's it? Alex gets what he wants?
What about my picture on the board? Was it Alex?

apology.text: But I don't want him to make my life miserable too.

aboutBoard.text: She's really into Alex and if he messes with you, she's going to do the same.
And Jose is his lap dog, unable to think by himself.

talked.text: I'm truly sorry, for real, but my parents can't find out about it.
